### New Quiz Checklist

- [ ] The new quiz has been added to the Book.txt file in the order it should be seen by the learner.

- [ ] Spell check runs successfully using [Github actions style-n-check](https://github.com/ottrproject/OTTR_Template/wiki/How-to-set-up-and-customize-GitHub-actions-robots#spell-check).

- [ ] The color palette choices of the slide are contrasted in a way that is friendly to those with color vision deficiencies.
You can check this using [Color Oracle](https://colororacle.org/).
